#labels Phase-Implementation,Serial
= Serial Commands =

== Input ==
Nach jeder Eingabe CR LF (\r\n) - Befehle maximal 80 Zeichen!

*LED*
 * l0 ... LED off
 * l1 ... LED flash
 * l2 ... LED blink
 * l3 ... LED on

*Debug*
 * d0 ... Debug off
 * dr ... Toggle Receiver on/off

*Parameter*<br />
Format: p 00(-99, 2-stelliger Parameter) : 12345 (Wert max 5 Stellen) : \r\n
 * p00:1: ... Parameterset 0 oder 1
 * p01:12345: ... Debug (1.Receiver,)


== Output ==

=== Debug ===
*Receiver*<br />
Output all 100ms, Status 1=OK, CH Bereich 1000-2000<br />
{{{R-state:Status 0/1:[CH1]:[CH2]:[CH3]:[CH4]:[CH5]:[CH6]:[CH7]:[CH8]:\r\n}}}
